text: "Donkey Carol" is a Christmas choral work composed by John Rutter in the 1970shttps://www.hyperion-records.co.uk/tw.asp?w=W4111 and originally published by Oxford University Press.https://global.oup.com/academic/product/donkey- carol-9780193870987?cc=us⟨=en& Like "Jesus Child", it was originally commissioned by Simon Lindley, the then choir director of St Alban's School, Hertfordshire, England. ==References== Category:1970s songs Category:Christmas carols Category:Year of song missing
title: Donkey Carol
